name: Run Luke, Run! (V)
Lore: 'After seeing Vader strike down Obi-Wan, Luke attacked recklessly until he heard the old Jedi Master''s voice warn, ''Run Luke, Run!''',
Text: 'USED: During battle, if Obi-Wan out of play, cancel an attempt to target a Rebel with a weapon. LOST: During battle at a site, place non-[Episode I] Obi Wan out of play (even from hand); Your other characters there may move away for free.',
